name: trialist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sports
  specialized someone who takes part in a sports trial (= a period of games, races, etc. to discover whether they are good enough to play for a particular team or take part in a particular competition): In 1950, he had been an Olympic trialist for the Helsinki Games. It was a measure of Rooney's enthusiasm for international football that he performed like an eager triallist.
medical
  specialized someone who takes part in or organizes a clinical trial (= a scientific test of the effectiveness and safety of a drug or medical treatment, which involves using it with patients in a controlled way): A researcher or a clinical trialist will take such people and enrol them in a study.
